mapper.select: SELECT , b.resignation_time,b.type_of_turnover,b.reasons_for_leaving FROM em_user_company_personal a left join em_resignation b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.time_of_entry like #{month} or (b.resignation_time like #{month})
